cheat.name: Official NDS Cheat Database previously maintained by Narin, currently maintained by elixirdream and Demonic722.
cheat.note: http://cheats.gbatemp.net/, http://codemasters-project.net, http://gamehacking.org, http://ds-scene.net/

cheat.name: DS Lite Backlight Control
cheat.note: Hold L+R+SELECT then press UP to increase brightness or DOWN to decrease brightness

cheat.name: DS Phat Backlight Control
cheat.note: Hold L+R+SELECT then press UP to turn on screens or DOWN to turn off screens

cheat.name: Use motion pak in place of D-Pad
cheat.note: Digital

cheat.name: Use motion pak in place of D-Pad. (v2)
cheat.note: Pulse Proportional

cheat.name: 0xDB Code Type Fix
cheat.note: Fixes a bug in the Action Replay Code Handler.

cheat.name: Makes the D4 code type execute a 'ORR' instruction
Makes the D4 code type execute a 'AND' instruction
Makes the D4 code type execute an 'ADD' instruction
Add Dx Data to Offset Codes
cheat.note: This code changes the D4 code type to make it add the Dx Data to the offset. It could be useful if the game's pointer's offset changes.

cheat.name: 0x0E Execute Custom ASM Routines
cheat.note: This code changes the 0x0E code type to make it execute the data entered by the hacker.

cheat.name: 1 Second Counter Conditional Code
cheat.note: This conditional only runs once a second

cheat.name: Mario, Luigi and Wario Never Lose Cap
Infinite Fire Flower Power Up Time
Yoshi: Press L for Flower Power (Fire)
Wario: Press L for Flower Power (Metal)
Luigi: Press L for Flower Power (Invisibility)
Mario: Press L for Feather Power (Wings)
Any Character: Press START+R for Mario Power Up (Wings)
Any Character: Press START+L for Wario Power Up (Metal)
cheat.note: DO NOT USE WHILE IN WATER!
